attributes.action: allow South West Trains to re-introduce a May to December service west of Exeter St Davids
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The DfT forced South West Trains to withdraw all services west of Exeter St Davids from the December 2009 timetable. From the May 2010 timetable, trains should be re-introduced annually between 1st May and 30th September between London Waterloo and Plymouth, Paignton and Penzance. If this is not done, passengers will be forced to use First Great Western services, which will lead to serious over crowding on services west of Exeter in summer.
